info.name: Single-column Ask.fm (2015)
info.description: Single column style for Ask.fm, similiar to "the old design" (before 12/2015). Expanded profile descriptions, more space for text, some typography tweaks.
info.additionalInfo:
2015-12-15 initial release
2015-12-18 tweak <1300px width layout and notifications
2015-12-19 put yellow "Ask" box to top
2015-12-20 bigger textarea for answers
2016-01-14 fix for the "orange" redesign (red hearts next to liked answers, restored old fonts, bigger profile background picture)
2016-06-06 remove "people you might know" from stream
2016-08-28 fix profile description
2017-01-06 expand long answers
